overview: We meet up with our cute little couple from Normandy and their pals for an explosive fireworks session of red hot sex. Settings include: a small (but not so quiet) beach, green prairies in the country, or even amid the debris from a house under renovation. With the mason and the glazier to top it off! They go at it in duos, trios, four-ways. Acrobatic positions. You name it. View this second opus without moderation and cum, cum, cum again…
